title: How Many Calories in an Acai Bowl?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in an acai bowl, including carbs, protein, fat, and customizable tweaks for your breakfast bowl.
h1: How Many Calories in an Acai Bowl?
assumptions: Standard 250g serving: blended acai puree with banana, topped with granola, strawberries, blueberries; no added sweeteners or proteins.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, portion size, toppings, and brands. Check labels or recipes for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A typical acai bowl contains about 400 calories, packed with antioxidants and fiber from fruits.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an acai bowl with granola?
faqs.a: About 400 kcal for a standard bowl including granola and fruit toppings.

faqs.q: Are acai bowls high in protein?
faqs.a: Typically 6g protein; add nuts or yogurt to boost it to 15g+.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in an acai bowl?
faqs.a: Around 60g carbs, mostly from fruits and granola, with 8g fiber.

faqs.q: Can acai bowls be low calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, skip granola and use fewer fruits for under 250 kcal.

faqs.q: How does preparation affect calories in an acai bowl?
faqs.a: Blended with milk adds ~100 kcal; dairy-free options keep it lower.
